text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ

translation.en.sahih: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
translation.id.indonesian: Dan adapun orang-orang yang takut kepada kebesaran Tuhannya dan menahan diri dari keinginan hawa nafsunya,
